		chargeCard (line 376)
	
 
	
	

Charges an amount to the specified card

	
    
				
  • return: The DPS Transaction ID for the successful transaction
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardNumberLengthException If the card number exceeds 20 characters
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardHolderNameException If the cardholder name is too long
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardNumberCharException If the card number has non-numeric characters
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardExpiryMonthException If the card expiry month is not in the range 00-12
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSMerchantReferenceException If the merchant reference is too long
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardExpiryYearException If the card expiry year is not in the range 00-99
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSTransactionFailureException If the card could not be loaded
    • 
			

	
	

		string
		
			chargeCard
		
					(string $cardholder_name, string $card_number, string $expiry_month, string $expiry_year, float $amount, [string $merchant_ref = null])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$cardholder_name: The cardholder's name as written on the card, max 64 chars			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$card_number: The credit card number, numeric, max 20 chars			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$expiry_month: The two digit credit card expiry month 00-12			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$expiry_year: The two digit credit card expiry year 00-99			
    • 
					
  • 
				float
				$amount: The amount to bill the loaded card			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$merchant_ref: [Optional] Our reference for this card load, max 64 chars			
    • 
				

		
			
	




	
	

		
		chargeLoadedCard (line 343)
	
 
	
	

Charge a card already loaded into the DPS system (Rebill Phase)

	
    
				
  • return: The DPS Transaction ID for the successful transaction
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSMerchantReferenceException If the merchant reference is too long
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSTransactionFailureException If the loaded card could not be charged
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSBadBillingIdException If no billing ID is provided
    • 
			

	
	

		string
		
			chargeLoadedCard
		
					( $billing_id, float $amount, [string $merchant_ref = null], [bool $is_dps_billing_id = true])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				float
				$amount: The amount to bill the loaded card			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$merchant_ref: [Optional] Our reference for this card load, max 64 chars			
    • 
					
  • 
				bool
				$is_dps_billing_id: Whether the billing ID is one generated by DPS or our system. True for DPS, false for us. Default is true			
    • 
					
  • 
				
				$billing_id			
    •

		loadCard (line 272)
	
 
	
	

Loads card details into DPS system for future billing using a $1 Auth transaction (Setup Phase)

	
    
				
  • return: The DPS BillingId for the loaded card - max 16 characters
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardNumberLengthException If the card number exceeds 20 characters
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardHolderNameException If the cardholder name is too long
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardNumberCharException If the card number has non-numeric characters
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardExpiryMonthException If the card expiry month is not in the range 00-12
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSTransactionFailureException If the card could not be loaded
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSMerchantReferenceException If the merchant reference is too long
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSCardExpiryYearException If the card expiry year is not in the range 00-99
    • 
				
  • throws: DPSBadBillingIdException If the billing ID is too long
    • 
			

	
	

		string
		
			loadCard
		
					(string $cardholder_name, string $card_number, string $expiry_month, string $expiry_year, [string $merchant_ref = null], [string $billing_id = null])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$cardholder_name: The cardholder's name as written on the card, max 64 chars			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$card_number: The credit card number, numeric, max 20 chars			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$expiry_month: The two digit credit card expiry month 00-12			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$expiry_year: The two digit credit card expiry year 00-99			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$merchant_ref: [Optional] Our reference for this card load, max 64 chars			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$billing_id: [Optional] The billing ID to tag this loaded card with. If not provided, relies on DPS to generate a DpsBillingId for future identification. Max 32 chars			
    •
